extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    PHGY 210/6.0 or PHGY 212/6.0 or PHGY 214/6.0 or IDIS150.

basic.description: An introductory course in Pathophysiology in which the underlying functional changes of cell and cell systems will be discussed in association with a variety of disease processes.
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Pathophysiology
